recipe.title: Guinness Mustard
ingredients: 2 tablespoons Guinness stout or other stout or porter
instructions: Whisk all ingredients in small bowl to blend. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours. DO AHEAD: Can be made 2 days ahead. Keep refrigerated.
